backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features related to ContactSection link updates with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH color variables with light and dark theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO meta tags and Google Fonts setup loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Composes the main sections (Hero, About, Services, Contact) and Footer into the page layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution, navigation links, and a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section with highlight cards and a detailed 'Why Work With Me' panel.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section rendering contact method cards and social links using mailto, tel, and external URLs.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with background image, avatar, headline, CTAs, and animated stats.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Renders a Services section displaying a grid of service cards with icons, descriptions, and styling, plus a call-to-action link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on the userâ€™s Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling authentication, identity loading, login flow, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom color/theme system using CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, components, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, requirements, and state tracking for the build plan.
